title: Question schema
description: Knowledge based pure democracy question JSON document.

examples.q:
Decide which project is the best
A - AAA
B - BBB
C - CCC

t.title: Title of the question
t.description: Title shown in the table of the questions

q.title: Question text
q.description:
The text of the question. MAY contain new lines specified as 
.
examples:
Decide which project is the best
A - AAA
B - BBB
C - CCC

duration.title: The duration how long the question is valid.
duration.description: Duration is calculated in number of blocks. If there is 1, the question will have valid votes only in the block of inception, and the next block.

category.title: The category
category.description: The category of the question. Categories are managed by the questioner.

e.title: Encryption address
e.description: The encryption address for encyption purposes according to Extension 3 of the specifications.

o.title: Valid vote options
o.description: Valid vote options. Object of mapping from code to text of the question. The code will be used in vote cast to specify the answer.
